Frequently Asked Questions

Your questions? Our answers!
#

I did not receive my key to access the dev version.

It seems that some users haven't received their access (for spam reasons). Please check your spam folder and/or send us a message via Kickstarter mailbox.

#

I can't connect to the dev version.

We may encounter some issues with our server. You get either "unexpected error" or "prototypo is down, working on it". Please try again later, and ping us on twitter, we will glad to help! — @prototypoApp

#

I can't export my custom font.

We have some issues with Safari for the moment. There is an issue opened about this, check it out on github.

#

When the v1.0 will be available?

We plan to release a first version in september with primary features announced in Kickstarter campaign. The dev version is our sandbox, and the v1.0 will be so much better! In the current version, we design glyphs only with contours and the result is not always satisfying. We are writing from scratch the next version to deal with custom skeletons/components to get the best design as possible.

#

Is Prototypo free?

All of prototypo's core is open-source, on our github and will stay there. You can download it and launch Prototypo with some command lines. If you don't know how to use a terminal, we will propose to use our servers with subscriptions.

#

Can I import my own font to modify it?

Actually, it's not that way Prototypo works. We create letter templates with all parameters behaviours. But we want to give you an easy way to code your own templates and increase the possibilities to make custom fonts.

#

I can't open .svg fonts with illustrator.

Illustrator can open .svg illustrations, not fonts. Use instead a type design application (Glyphr is an open-source web-app, give it a try!)

Feel free to contact us if you have any question or issue with Prototypo.
You also can check the Github project for other known issues.
